content: By planting this planet, you've become its life and soul. It'll grow wherever your heart takes it.
info: 莫白送新屋-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: Oh, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, forgive me. {A拍拍衣服}I've got one ready for you right here!
info: 莫白送新屋-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本
莫白送新屋-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: The seedling's grown a little more. Feels like it won't be long before it becomes a full tree. {A挠头}Perhaps there are some changes again... About the changes... hmm...
info: 莫白送新屋-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: Ahem... Well, the planet is rather small, which complicates construction work. But we've prepared a temporary abode, so you'll have somewhere to rest your head...
info: 莫白送新屋-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: Oh, and if you'd like to build fancier houses in the future, you'll have to wait for the planet to grow a bit more... and spend a bit more too, hoho~!
info: 莫白送新屋-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: ...{短暂停}{A惊讶}By the stars — What've you been through in the past? Mo worries, there won't ever be any loans.
info: 莫白送新屋-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: Hoho? Did I just see a star streak across the <style=Highlight>sky</style>? {A远眺}I wonder if I could catch it with an <style=Highlight>insect net</style>...
info: 莫白送新屋-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: This doesn't come with a loan, does it?
info: 莫白送新屋-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: Ah, I mean, get you settled in. After all, it's your life here that gives the planet its purpose.
info: 莫白送新屋-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: Now, I'd like you to have this Grasstop Grotto <style=Highlight>Building Kit</style> crafted by <style=Highlight>Loomi Co.</style>... <style=Highlight>Place</style> it wherever you'd like to make your home.
info: 莫白送新屋-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: Hoho! This is just a little something from <style=Highlight>Loomi Co.</style> {A挠头}We'll only rest easy once you're settled in.
info: 莫白送新屋-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: Though I don't yet know what kind of planet you hope to nurture it into... the most important thing now is to "plant" you here.
info: 莫白送新屋-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本
